snippet: The Rock and Roll Hall of Fame and Museum in Cleveland will enshrine the bands of frontmen who have already been honored.
abstract: The Rock and Roll Hall of Fame and Museum in Cleveland will enshrine the bands of frontmen who have already been honored.
lead_paragraph: Famous backing bands are finally getting some respect from the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame and Museum in Cleveland. At this year's ceremony on April 14 the hall plans to induct six early bands whose leaders are already in: the Blue Caps, the Comets, the Crickets, the Famous Flames, the Midnighters and the Miracles.

headline.main: Bands to Follow Their Frontmen Into Rock Hall of Fame

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Rock and Roll Hall of Fame and Museum
